> Memory: 8GB
> Video Card: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB / AMD HD7870 2GB
> Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectXÂ® 9.0

Features repack

Grand Theft Auto

Do not cut / recoded
Underlying - Rockstar Free Download Version
Radio also taken from the Free-version, rather than from disk
Softonic text from ZoG
Sewn fixes for radio and launcher

Grand Theft Auto: London 1969 & 1961

Do not cut / recoded
At the heart of London 1961 - Rockstar Free Download Version
Radio is taken from the disk version *.
Softonic text from Enpy + changes from Jart

Grand Theft Auto 2

Do not cut / recoded
Underlying - Rockstar Free Download Version
Softonic text from Buka (Radio works!)

Grand Theft Auto 3

Do not cut / recoded
Game Version - 1.1
Softonic text and textures from 1C

Grand Theft Auto Vice City

Do not cut / recoded
Game Version - 1.1
Softonic text from 1C

Grand Theft Auto San Andreas

Do not cut / recoded
Game Version - 1.1
Softonic text from 1C

Grand Theft Auto IV: Complete Edition

Do not cut / recoded
Versions of the game: GTA 4 - 1.0.7.0 (ENG), 1.0.6.1 (RUS), EFLC - 1.1.2.0 (ENG), 1.1.0.1 (RUS)
Optional installation Xliveless (otvyazka from GFWL)
Softonic text from 1C
3 installation options: GTA 4, GTA EFLC, GTA Complete Edition. (Warning! Any of these options at the same time placed)

Grand Theft Auto V

Game Version - v1.0.350.2 (Update 5)
Do not cut / recoded

* Activating the radio to London in 1969.

1. After installing the game will appear in the folder 2 File - GTALONDON.bin and GTALONDON.cue.
2. Mount GTALONDON.bin (desirable use of Alcohol 120) or record to disc.
ATTENTION! Mandatory requirement - the drive with the image  drive should be the first among all the drives!
